Question Next, Iâ€™m going to read you some descriptions of health problems people sometimes experience. Some people might go to a doctor, others might not. E. Accomplishing less than you would like with your work or other regular daily activities as a result of any emotional problems (such as feeling depressed or anxious)?

Values

  • 1 definitely go

  • 2 probably go

  • 3 probably not go

  • 4 definitely not go
